title: Which of these singers has the highest selling album in the 80s? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since you didn’t give a list to choose from, I’ll select my own: Vic Wilford (The Passmore Sisters)Joe Rooney (Guernica)Baz (The Farmer's Boys)Howard Turner (The Nivens)Sharon Dunleavy (Fruits Of Passion)Duglas T. Stewart (BMX Bandits)Paul Infanti (Treebound Story)Roddy Frame (Aztec Camera)James O'Neill and Jimmy Kemp (Jimmy Jimmy)Based on their incredible sales numbers, all of these bands deserves to win — but the honor goes to Roddy Frame, who sang “Oblivious” on Aztec Camera’s self-titled LP. Thanks for asking, and remember: "Acta deos numquam mortalia fallunt."
You’ve not presented options So obvious mainstream Would be Michael Jackson Others: Prince, Madonna, Whitney Houston, Stevie Nicks, countless singers maybe not the highest but certainly close….
